name: DLR - German Aerospace Center
description: DLR is the German aerospace research and technology centre. In its core areas, DLR develops technologies for aeronautics and space, energy and transport, as well as security and defence research. A broad spectrum of results and innovations bring benefits for industry and business, authorities and administration as well as for public stakeholders. DLR fulfils its responsibility to society through an intensive exchange of knowledge with public stakeholders and targeted technology transfer with industry.
